title: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Through Game-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of educational theory and basic understanding of social studies curriculum
context.additional_context: A project-based course for pre-service teachers analyzing commercial learning games and integrating them into educational contexts, emphasizing game-based learning design and evaluation via smartphones.

learning_goals: Analyze educational potential of commercial learning games and develop three or more design proposals integrated with social studies units
Conduct at least one project utilizing smartphone-based game learning environments and prepare outcome reports
Perform effectiveness analysis of game-based learning by applying project-based assessment criteria including peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
